lyrics.text:
‘Otua ta’engata ē,
Mau hinga ‘i ho lalo vaʻe;
He me’a mo’ui fulipē
‘Oku nau fepūnou’i ē:
‘O kau ‘a langi mo māmani
He hiki ho fu’u ngeia lahi.

Pēteliake, Palōfita,
‘A e kau Ma’ata kofu hina,
‘A e kau ‘Aposetolo tapu,
‘A e hōsitē na ta’emalau;
‘Oku nau tōmape’e kotoa
He ‘ao ‘o e ‘Afiona.

Ko Koe ‘a e Taha’i ‘Otua,
Ko e Motu-atu talu mu’a.
‘Ikai ha taha ofi ai,
Ha Maama pe ha taka langi:
Mau fai mama’o ‘emau hū,
‘O ‘ai he efu homau ngutu.
